thread.section_title: Hotel Monna Lisa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good
thread.title_full: Very good - Review of Hotel Monna Lisa, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: rog8777
title: Very good
text: Stayed for 3 nights in this cozy & clean hotel. The location was excellent with restaurants, cafes, shops all around the vicinity. My international office is only 4mins by foot & i am glad i stayed here. Beds are super comfy and staff at check-in & check-out were just fabulous! Polite & friendly. Hermes toiletries too! What more could you ask for? Prices are competitive and hotel is better than many i've stayed in the vicinity! Highly recommended!
